page.title: 15LEISURE IN RAMSBOTTOM
page.content: Children's{Leisure}Survey. In our class of 11 year olds{sport}is the favourite pastime, with children belonging to swimming, football, karate, skating and ski-ing clubs. 36% of the class play a musical instrument, 95% own a bike, 52% have a computer,80% have a record or casette player and 65% have a television in their own room. Alton Towers in Staffordshire is a favourite place for trips. In 1984 90% of the class had a{holiday,}25% of these going abroad and 25% going to Wales. Most children receive between Â£1 and Â£2{pocket-money,}which they use to buy sweets, comics, magazines and records. Most of us like to wear jeans and a sweater or tracksuit when we are not wearing our school-uniform.
